body:
reads literally:

"Stonecloaker
  return a creature Monty Carlocontrol to its owner's hand. (Caregiver)"

Either "...return a creature you control..."
or 
"...return a creature Monty Carlo controls..."

Anyway, its missing a space after PN, too
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Stonecloaker typo/missing space

comments.body:
Fixed in revision ab32cea14c22

**Status:** Accepted  
  **Owner:** ShawnieBoyUK
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 30, 2014 06:37:20_

reads literally:

"Stonecloaker
  return a creature Monty Carlocontrol to its owner's hand. (Caregiver)"

Either "...return a creature you control..."
or 
"...return a creature Monty Carlo controls..."

Anyway, its missing a space after PN, too

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=564_
